plot: Cynthia and Allison investigate further into the kidnapping, while Allison still sees into Cynthia's past. After helping Bridgette with her science project, Joe gets a prediction from his middle daughter about his future finances.

Allison continues to dream about Cynthia Keener's daughter and manages to determine where her daughter's remains are to be found. Both she and Cynthia are convinced that Joanna Wheeler is the culprit but cannot find any evidence to prove it. When the one potential witness they do have is murdered, Cynthia is left with only one solution. Bridgette tells her dad that she had a dream about him getting a loan at the bank. All he has to do is go to the white-haired man and all his problems will be solved. The solution isn't quite as simple as getting a loan however.—garykmcd
